steps: 2. Load models using TensorFlow Lite Interpreter
3. Collect sensor data at 50Hz for 2-3 seconds
4. Format data as Float32Array[600] for exercise recognition

kotlin_example.sensor_collection: Use SensorManager for ACCELEROMETER and GYROSCOPE
kotlin_example.data_format: Concatenate 6 sensor arrays: [accel_x(100), accel_y(100), accel_z(100), gyro_x(100), gyro_y(100), gyro_z(100)]
